fields.name: itemPatterns
javadoc: A list of all the banner patterns.

fields.name: patterns
javadoc: A list of all patterns stored on this banner.

methods.name: getPatternCount
javadoc: Retrieves the amount of patterns stored on an ItemStack. If the tag does not exist this value will be 0.

methods.name: getPatterns
javadoc: Retrieves the list of patterns for this tile entity. The banner data will be initialized/refreshed before this happens.

methods.name: getUpdatePacket
javadoc: Retrieves packet to send to the client whenever this Tile Entity is resynced via World.notifyBlockUpdate. For modded TE's, this packet comes back to you clientside in {@link #onDataPacket}

methods.name: getUpdateTag
javadoc: Get an NBT compound to sync to the client with SPacketChunkData, used for initial loading of the chunk or when many blocks change at once. This compound comes back to you clientside in {@link handleUpdateTag}

methods.name: removeLastPattern
javadoc: Removes all the banner related data from a provided instance of ItemStack.
